```{r}
library(ggplot2)
# Importing data
History_of_baseball_salary <- read_csv("data/The History of Baseball dataset/salary.csv")
head(History_of_baseball_salary)
```
```{r}
library(scales)
HOB_allstar <- read_csv("data/The History of Baseball dataset/all_star.csv")
head(HOB_allstar)
allstar_after_1985 <- HOB_allstar %>% filter(year>=1985)
head(allstar_after_1985)
```

```{r}
allstar_salary <- inner_join(allstar_after_1985, History_of_baseball_salary, by = c ("player_id", "year"))
head(allstar_salary)
```
```{r}
ggplot(allstar_salary, aes(x = as.factor(year), y = salary)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels=comma) +
  labs(title = "Distribution of All-Star Player Salaries by Year",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Salary (in USD)") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
read_csv()
```
